Description: Pratesi Womens Italian Leather Bakem Medium Cross-Body Messenger Satchel Bag in Cherry This Medium Bakem cross-body bag is the Mid-range sized version out of the variations creating a bag that is both functional and bold in statement. Perfect for when you are on the move. This stylish cross-body bag is hand made using old world techniques, using only eco-friendly vegetable products. It has a single cross body shoulder strap, a leather flap over with Pratesi badge secures this bag with a single buckle strap. The interior had open pocket under flap leading to single compartment with Pratesi"s signature detachable LED light and smart phone open pocket. Exterior rear zippered pocket. Garment dust cover bag included. From the Bruce Range Collection, this product is handmade in the Florence region of Italy, tanned with a special technique that uses only natural ingredients; the finish has a very soft and flexible feel to it with a grained matted look that develops a beautiful patina as the leather matures over time. This Bakem cross-body bag features exterior rear zippered pocket to carry your essentials The interior had open pocket under flap leading to single compartment with Pratesi"s signature detachable LED light and smart phone open pocket It has a single cross body shoulder strap for carrying comfort Dimensions: 10 (L) x 2 (W) x 12 (H) in.
